title: TechStuff Classic: Ghost Hunting Tech
itunes:title: TechStuff Classic: Ghost Hunting Tech
description:
In this episode of TechStuff, Jonathan and Chris discuss ghost hunting technology -- and ghost hunting in general -- from a skeptical perspective.
